name: ElbmarKs
description:
After surviving more than 3000 years of dissension, fighting, and self-destruction finally we learned to leave together with mother nature and each other, but now mankind needs to face a new, never seen, powerful, external enemy.

Nobody knows where they came from but we realized quickly we have to fight to survive.

A small talented scout team gave their life to localize the base of the alien intruders, scientists working day and night created an enhanced version of our probably biggest invention of all time, a teleport that can send the brave human fighters right inside the enemy base.

But the crux is just coming right now, our heroes must search and acquire all the possible information about the enemy base to hopefully be able to destroy it ...



During the game, you must, destroy lurking enemies, or just avoid or take over them, find and use hidden aids, destroy, deactivate, and avoid different kinds of gates, get through enemy waves, and be patient, accurate, and quick when it's needed, test your memory in the labyrinths.
Do not forget to collect the missing pieces of the enemy base blueprint on each level to get to the next one and be able to unlock new spaceships!

You can select from 3 Difficulty levels, Practice, Normal, and Classic.
  • In Practice difficulty mode you have checkpoints saved to continue from a given part of a level, and 5 lives to complete each and every level
  • In Normal difficulty mode you have 3 lives to complete each and every level
  • In Classic difficulty mode you only have 3 lives to complete the whole game

The game now has a Leaderboard too, but only Normal, and Classic mode results are participating, sorry ;)

Spoiler Alert!

The game has a physics-based movement system so your space-ship moves with a bit of inertia, it could take a while to get familiar with it, figure out how to avoid or take over e.g. the enemy missiles, but do not give up, it is worth the effort I promise ;)
Precision and accuracy are also key to getting through the levels and you will need stamina too as in Normal Difficulty mode you only have 3 lives to solve a single level, and in the good old Classic mode only 3 to finish the whole game!
